Title: Transmission Spectroscopy of the Habitable Zone Exoplanet 
       LHS 1140b with JWST/NIRISS 
Authors: Cadieux C., Doyon R., MacDonald R.J., Turbet M., Artigau E., Lim O., 
         Radica M., Fauchez T.J., Salhi S., Dang L., Albert L., Coulombe L., 
         Cowan N.B., Lafreniere D., L'Heureux A., Piaulet-Ghorayeb C., 
         Benneke B., Cloutier R., Charnay B., Cook N.J., Fournier-Tondreau M.,
         Plotnykov M., Valencia D. 
Table: NIRISS SOSS transmission spectra of LHS 1140 b and c
================================================================================
Byte-by-byte Description of file: apjlad5afat2_mrt.txt
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   Bytes Format Units   Label    Explanations
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   1-  7 F7.5   um      CWave    Central wavelength
   9- 15 F7.5   um      Width    Bandwidth
  17- 23 F7.2   ppm     Depth-b  Transit depth of planet b
  25- 30 F6.2   ppm   e_Depth-b  Uncertainty in Depth-b
  32- 38 F7.2   ppm     Depth-c  Transit depth of planet c
  40- 45 F6.2   ppm   e_Depth-c  Uncertainty in Depth-c
  47- 47 I1     ---     Order    Order number
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
